OOC: I was just guessing. Sniffly sniff...

  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: LurkerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 1=
2, 2001 5:46 PM
  Subject: Re: Remember Them........


  OOC: What?  Um....=
No, never had a character named Nitro or Hell Demon.  But in HD, the H does=
 represent Hell...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Om=
ega 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, June 12, 2001 5:39 =
PM
    Subject: Re: Remember Them........


    OOC: Ummm...Nitro and Hell =
Demon?...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: LurkerAbyss 
   =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, June 12, 2001 5:24 PM
 =
     Subject: Remember Them........


      OOC: Try to guess who they are =
everybody, from the first letters of their names.....(Legendarynemasis and =
Yanshosh, you guys know, so don't tell!)
      ::N/HD::
       
           =
A bat hovered in the air with his wings, and along side him, a black, armou=
red-cyborg horse, their shadows seemed to loom over the CF.
       
       =
    "Bro, we made it back.  It seems so long.  I'm glad we defeated that cr=
eep.....I think...." HD said to her brother N.
       
           "Yes, we =
have made it back to the Cybertronian Fire, sister.  Shall we see how the w=
orld has changed since we were gone from civilization?" N suggested.
      =
 
            HD nodded her head.  They both continued getting closer to th=
e CF.  They both transformed to robot mode.
